question: Which Indian health institute has won first prize for sanitation & hygiene under the Kayakalp awards 2017?
option1: National Institute of Tuberculosis and Respiratory Diseases (NITRD), Delhi
option2: North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS), Shillong
option3: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER), Chandigarh
option4: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
answer: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
